content: **if you enjoyed this freebie consider leaving me a tip on my ko-fi 1 ** i have designed this pattern as a companion to my ever popular skimmer socks 2 pattern does the world really need another sock pattern what are you new here of course we do i designed this sock pattern to be the holy grail it is toe up has a thorough video tutorial and is sized for everyone and i do mean everyone from infants to adults due to the popularity of this pattern i decided to add a tutorial video so that those who are beginners to toe-up sock patterns don t get lost along the way i will walk you through every step see the tutorial here https //youtu be/si5ttvsc25o 3 **sizes ** infant baby 2-3 toddler 4-5 toddler child x small small medium large x large to fit an actual arch circumference of 3 25 3 5 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 or 8 5 9 10 12 5 15 18 20 5 23 25 5 28 cm **yarn ** 25 450 yards/25 415 meters of sock weight yarn i recommend a machine washable yarn with roughly 25% nylon content **needles ** size us 2/2 75 mm and us 1 5/2 5 mm circular needles with an appropriate size cable for your preferred method of working in the round or size needed to obtain gauge and one size smaller **gauge ** roughly 28 stitches and 36 row equal 4 /10 cm square in stockinette stitch on larger needles worked in the round **techniques ** knitting in the round judy s magic cast on can sub other toe-up cast on if preferred short row basic increases and decreases -------------------------------------------- find me online _@knitoriousshe #sheshesocks for first notice to opening of tests new patterns and as always fantastic freebies like me on facebook knitorious s h e 4 1 https //ko-fi com/knitoriousshe 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/skimmer-socks-revisited 3 https //youtu be/si5ttvsc25o 4 https //www facebook com/pages/knitorious-s-h-e/737944959561355
